amendatorysection.catchline: Connection device; unlawful repositioning; violation; penalty.
amendatorysection.para: Except for fifth-wheel repositioning done pursuant to section 60-6,301, it shall be unlawful to reposition the fifth-wheel connection device of a truck-tractor and semitrailer combination while such combination is carrying cargo and on the state highway system. Any person violating this section shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor.
